tools

Class Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.Commands

  • public class Commands
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple class that sends and receives commands from RTB4FREE bidders.
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Commands(java.lang.String redis)
      Instantiate a connection to localhost (Redisson) Also contains the listener for responses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadDatabase()
      Add more users to the redis database
      void loadInFromDatabase()
      Send a load from database file command.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main entry point, see description for usage.
      void removeUser()
      Delete a user from the database
      void sendEcho(java.lang.String to)
      Send an echo command
      void shutdown()
      Stop the redisson client.
      void startBidder()
      Send a start bidder command
      void startCampaign()
      Start a campaign (by loading into bidder memory
      void stopBidder()
      Send a stop bidder command
      void stopCampaign()
      Stop a campaign by removing from bidders memory
      void unloadCampaignFromMemory()
      Send a message to unload a campaign from memory.
